description.brazilian: Mate um antlion worker ácido.
description.english: Kill an acid antlion worker.
description.bulgarian: Убийте киселинен мраволъвски работник.
description.czech: Zabijte jedovatou antlioní dělnici.
description.danish: Dræb en syre-antlion-arbejder.
description.dutch: Dood een antlion-werker.
description.french: Tuez une fourmi-lion acide.
description.german: Töten Sie einen Säure-Ameisenlöwenarbeiter.
description.hungarian: Ölj meg egy savas hangyalesőt.
description.italian: Uccidi una formicaleone operaia.
description.japanese: アシッドライオンを 1 匹倒す。
description.norwegian: Drep en syre-antlion-arbeider.
description.polish: Zabij plującego kwasem mrówkolwa-trutnia.
description.portuguese: Mate uma formiga-leão cuspidora de ácido obreira.
description.romanian: Ucide un muncitor antlion acid.
description.russian: Убить муравьиного льва, плюющегося кислотой.
description.schinese: 杀死酸性蚁狮工兵。
description.spanish: Mata a una hormiga león obrera ácida.
description.swedish: Döda en syramyrlejonarbetare.
description.tchinese: 殺死酸性獅蟻工兵。
description.thai: ฆ่าแอซิดแอนท์ไลออนเวิร์กเกอร์
description.turkish: Bir tane asitli antlion işçisi öldür.

description.brazilian: Esmague todas as larvas de antlion em Episode Two.
description.english: Squish every antlion grub in Episode Two.
description.bulgarian: Смачкайте всички мраволъвски личинки в Episode Two.
description.czech: Rozmačkej všechny antlioní larvy ve hře Episode Two.
description.danish: Kvas alle antlion-larver i Episode Two.
description.dutch: Trap alle antlion-larven dood in Episode Two.
description.french: Écrasez toutes les larves de fourmis-lions de l'Épisode 2.
description.german: Zerquetschen Sie alle Ameisenlöwenlarven in Episode Zwei.
description.hungarian: Zúzd szét az összes hangyaleső-lárvát a Második Epizódban.
description.italian: Schiaccia tutte le larve di formicaleone in Episode 2.
description.japanese: エピソード 2 でアントライオンの幼虫をすべてつぶす。
description.norwegian: Skvis alle antlion-larver i episode to.
description.polish: Rozgnieć wszystkie larwy mrówkolwa w Episode Two.
description.portuguese: Esmague todos os vermes de formiga-leão no Episode Two.
description.romanian: Împrăştie toată haleala antlionilor în Episodul doi.
description.russian: Раздавить всех личинок в Эпизоде 2.
description.schinese: 压扁 Episode 2 中的每只蚁狮幼虫。
description.spanish: Aplasta todas las larvas de hormiga del Episodio 2.
description.swedish: Mosa varenda myrlejonmask i episod två.
description.tchinese: 壓扁二部曲中的每隻獅蟻幼蟲。
description.thai: บี้แอนท์ไลออนกรับทุกตัวใน Episode Two
description.turkish: Oyunda bulunan tüm antlion kurtçuklarını ez.

displayName.japanese: ピニャータパーティー

description.brazilian: Ache e quebre todas as teias em Episode Two.
description.english: Find and break every web cache in Episode Two.
description.bulgarian: Намерете и разкъсайте всяка една мрежа с припаси в Episode Two.
description.czech: Najdi a protrhej všechny pavučinové skrýše ve hře Episode Two.
description.danish: Find og knus alle kokoner i Episode Two.
description.dutch: Vind en breek elke webcache in Episode Two.
description.finnish: Etsi ja tuhoa jokainen Episode 2:n verkkosäkki.
description.french: Trouvez et détruisez toutes les poches de fourmis-lions de l’Épisode 2.
description.german: Finden und zerstören Sie alle Netzkäfige in Episode Zwei.
description.hungarian: Találd meg az összes hálóba ragadt ellátmányt a Második Epizódban.
description.italian: Trova e rompi ogni bozzolo in Episode 2.
description.japanese: エピソード 2 で、クモの巣に隠れたアイテムを 1 つ残らず見つけて取る。
description.koreana: 에피소드 2에 있는 모든 거미집 땅굴을 발견하여 파괴하십시오.
description.norwegian: Finn og knus alle nettdepoter i episode to.
description.polish: Odnajdź i rozetnij każdą skrytkę zwiniętą w sieci, w Epizodzie 2.
description.portuguese: Encontre e quebre todos os depósitos de teia no Episode Two.
description.romanian: Găseşte şi sparge fiecare ascunzătoare Web din Episodul doi.
description.russian: Найти и вскрыть все коконы в Эпизоде 2.
description.schinese: 找出并破坏 Episode 2 中的每个存有补给的虫网。
description.spanish: Rompe todas las telarañas con suministros del Episodio 2.
description.swedish: Hitta och ha sönder varenda vävgömma i episod två.
description.tchinese: 找出並破壞二部曲中的每個網路快取。
description.thai: ค้นหาและทำลายเว็บแคชทั้งหมดใน Episode Two
description.turkish: Oyunda bulunan tüm ağları bul ve yırt.

description.brazilian: Ajude Griggs e Sheckley a conter a invasão antlion dentro da mina.
description.english: Help Griggs and Sheckley hold off the antlion invasion inside the mine shaft.
description.bulgarian: Помогнете на Григс и Шекли да удържат мраволъвското нашествие в минната шахта.
description.czech: Pomoz Griggsovi a Sheckleymu odrazit invazi antlionů uvnitř těžební šachty.
description.danish: Hjælp Griggs og Sheckley med at holde antlion-invasionen tilbage i mineskakten.
description.dutch: Help Griggs en Sheckley de antlion-invasie op afstand te houden in de mijnschacht.
description.finnish: Auta Griggsiä ja Sheckleytä pidättelemään muurahaiskorentojen hyökkäystä kaivoskuilussa.
description.french: Aidez Griggs et Sheckley à repousser l'invasion des fourmis-lions dans la mine.
description.german: Helfen Sie Griggs und Sheckley, die Invasion der Ameisenlöwen aufzuhalten.
description.hungarian: Segíts Griggsnek és Sheckleynek visszaverni a hangyaleső-inváziót a bányában.
description.italian: Aiuta Griggs e Sheckley a fermare l'invasione di formicheleone nella miniera.
description.japanese: グリッグスとシェクリーに手を貸し、坑道の中にアントライオンが侵入するのを防ぐ。
description.koreana: 그릭스와 셰클리가 광산 수갱으로 침투하는 개미귀신을 막는 것을 도와주십시오.
description.norwegian: Hjelp Griggs og Sheckley med å holde unna antlion-invasjonen inne i gruvesjakten.
description.polish: Pomóż Griggsowi i Sheckley'owi odeprzeć atak antlionów wewnątrz szybu kopalni.
description.portuguese: Ajude Griggs e Sheckley a repelir a invasão de formigas-leão dentro da mina.
description.romanian: Ajută-i pe Griggs şi Sheckley să ţină la distanţă invazia antlionilor în puţul de mină.
description.russian: Помочь Григгсу и Шекли сдержать нападение муравьиных львов в шахте.
description.schinese: 帮助葛利格斯和雪克莱在矿井中防止蚁狮入侵。
description.spanish: Ayuda a Griggs y a Sheckley a rechazar la invasión de hormigas león en la mina.
description.swedish: Hjälp Griggs och Sheckley att hålla undan myrlejoninvasionen i gruvschaktet.
description.tchinese: 幫助葛利格斯及雪克萊在礦井中防止獅蟻入侵。
description.thai: ช่วย Griggs และ Sheckley ยับยั้งการบุกรุกของแอนท์ไลออนภายในช่องเหมือง
description.turkish: Maden kuyusundaki antlion istilasını engellemek için Griggs ve Sheckley'e yardım et.

description.brazilian: Derrote ambos antlion guards fora da White Forest.
description.english: Defeat both antlion guards outside the White Forest.
description.bulgarian: Победете и двата мраволъва пазители извън Бялата гора.
description.czech: Poraz oba antlioní strážce v Bílém lese.
description.danish: Besejr begge antlion-vagter uden for White Forest.
description.dutch: Versla de beide antlion guards buiten White Forest.
description.finnish: Kukista molemmat muurahaiskorentosuojelijat White Forestin ulkopuolella.
description.french: Débarrassez-vous des deux gardes fourmis-lions à l'extérieur de White Forest.
description.german: Besiegen Sie beide Wachen der Ameisenlöwen vor White Forest.
description.hungarian: Győzd le mindkét hangyaleső őrt a Fehér-erdőnél.
description.italian: Sconfiggi le due guardie formicheleone fuori da White Forest.
description.japanese: ホワイト・フォレストの外で両方のアントライオン・ガードを倒す。
description.koreana: 화이트 포리스트 밖에 있는 두 개미귀신 경비병을 모두 해치우십시오.
description.norwegian: Bekjemp begge antlion-vaktene i utkanten av White Forest.
description.polish: Pokonaj obu antlionów-strażników w okolicach White Forest.
description.portuguese: Derrote as duas formiga-leão guardiãs fora de White Forest.
description.romanian: Învinge ambii paznici antlion din afara Pădurii albe.
description.russian: Победить обоих стражей по дороге в Белую Рощу.
description.schinese: 击败白森林外的两只蚁狮卫兵。
description.spanish: Derrota a las dos hormigas guardianas a las afueras de White Forest.
description.swedish: Besegra båda myrlejonvakterna utanför White Forest.
description.tchinese: 擊敗白森林外的兩隻獅蟻守衛。
description.thai: จัดการแอนท์ไลออนการ์ดทั้งคู่ด้านนอก White Forest
description.turkish: Beyaz Orman dışındaki iki kum böceği koruyucusunu da öldür.

description.brazilian: Atropele 20 inimigos com o carro em Episode Two.
description.english: Run over 20 enemies with the car in Episode Two.
description.bulgarian: Прегазете 20 врага с колата в Episode Two.
description.czech: Přejeď svým autem 20 nepřátel ve hře Episode Two.
description.danish: Kør over 20 fjender med bilen i Episode Two.
description.dutch: Rij met de auto over 20 vijanden heen in Episode Two.
description.french: Écrasez 20 ennemis avec la voiture dans Épisode 2.
description.german: Überfahren Sie 20 Feinde in Episode Zwei.
description.hungarian: Üss el 20 ellenséget a kocsival a Második Epizódban.
description.italian: Investi più di 20 nemici con l'auto in Episode 2.
description.japanese: エピソード 2 で、20 体の敵を車でひく。
description.koreana: 에피소드 2에서 20명 이상의 적을 차로 한번에 죽이십시오.
description.norwegian: Kjør over 20 fiender med bilen i episode to.
description.polish: Rozjedź samochodem 20 przeciwników w Epizodzie 2.
description.portuguese: Atropele mais de 20 inimigos com o carro no Episode Two.
description.romanian: Ucide peste 20 de inamici cu maşina în Episodul doi.
description.russian: Переехать машиной более 20 врагов.
description.schinese: 在 Episode 2 中开车辗过超过 20 个敌人。
description.spanish: Atropella a 20 enemigos con el coche en el Episodio 2.
description.swedish: Kör över 20 fiender med bilen i episod två.
description.tchinese: 在二部曲中開車輾過超過 20 個敵人。
description.thai: หนีศัตรู 20 ตัวด้วยรถใน Episode Two
description.turkish: 20 düşmanın üzerinden arabayla geç.

description.brazilian: Sobreviva à emboscada Hunter com Alyx.
description.english: Survive the Hunter ambush with Alyx.
description.bulgarian: Измъкнете се жив с Аликс от засадата на ловците.
description.czech: Přežij s Alyx přepadení Lovci.
description.danish: Overlev hunternes baghold sammen med Alyx.
description.dutch: Overleef de Hunter-hinderlaag met Alyx.
description.french: Survivez à l'embuscade des chasseurs avec Alyx.
description.german: Überleben Sie mit Alyx den Hinterhalt der Jäger.
description.hungarian: Éld túl a vadászatot Alyxszel.
description.italian: Sopravvivi all'imboscata dei Cacciatori con Alyx.
description.japanese: アリックスと共に、受けるハンターとの戦いを生き残る。
description.norwegian: Overlev Hunter-bakholdet med Alyx.
description.polish: Przeżyj zasadzkę hunterów z Alyx.
description.portuguese: Sobreviva à emboscada com a Alyx.
description.romanian: Supravieţuieşte ambuscadei Hunterilor cu Alyx.
description.russian: Пережить битву с охотниками вместе с Аликс.
description.schinese: 爱莉克斯逃脱了捕食者的伏兵。
description.spanish: Sobrevive a la emboscada de ráptores con Alyx.
description.swedish: Överlev jägarbakhållet med Alyx.
description.tchinese: 與艾莉絲一起通過獵人的埋伏。
description.thai: รอดจากการซุ่มโจมตีของ Hunter พร้อมกับ Alyx
description.turkish: Alyx'le birlikte Hunter pususundan kurtul.

description.brazilian: Derrube o helicóptero em Episode Two sem nenhum erro.
description.english: Defeat the chopper in Episode Two without any misses.
description.bulgarian: Победете хеликоптера в Episode Two без несполучливи удари.
description.czech: Poraz vrtulník ve hře Episode Two, aniž bys jedinkrát minul.
description.danish: Besejr helikopteren i Episode Two uden at ramme ved siden af.
description.dutch: Versla de heli in Episode Two zonder missers.
description.finnish: Tuhoa Episode 2:n kopteri ampumatta kertaakaan ohi.
description.french: Détruisez l'hélico dans l'Épisode 2 sans rater un seul tir.
description.german: Holen Sie in Episode Zwei den Heli ohne Fehlschüsse vom Himmel.
description.hungarian: Semmisítsd meg a helikoptert a Második Epizódban elhibázott lövések nélkül.
description.italian: Sconfiggi l'elicottero di Episode 2 senza sbagliare un colpo.
description.japanese: エピソード 2 で、ミスすることなく、ヘリを撃墜する。
description.koreana: 에피소드 2에서 한 번의 오발도 없이 헬기를 추락시키십시오.
description.norwegian: Overvinn helikopteret i episode to uten å bomme.
description.polish: Pokonaj helikopter w Epizodzie 2, nie pudłując ani razu.
description.portuguese: Derrote o helicóptero no Episode Two sem falhar nenhum disparo.
description.romanian: Învinge maşina din Episodul doi fără niciun rateu.
description.russian: Уничтожить вертолет, ни разу не промахнувшись.
description.schinese: 在 Episode Two 中毫无失误击败直升机。
description.spanish: Derrota al helicóptero del Episodio 2 sin fallar ningún disparo.
description.swedish: Besegra helikoptern i episod två utan att missa.
description.tchinese: 在二部曲中毫無失誤擊敗直昇機。
description.thai: จัดการเฮลิคอปเตอร์ใน Episode Two โดยไม่มีพลาด
description.turkish: Oyundaki helikopteri hiç ıskalamadan bozguna uğrat.

description.brazilian: Destrua a Combine Autogun no ferro-velho.
description.english: Destroy the Combine Autogun in the junkyard.
description.bulgarian: Унищожете автоматичното оръдие на Интеграторите в сметището.
description.czech: Znič automatický kanón Combine na vrakovišti.
description.danish: Tilintetgør Combines autokanon på skrotpladsen.
description.dutch: Vernietig de Combine-autogun op de schroothoop.
description.french: Détruisez la mitrailleuse du Cartel dans la décharge.
description.german: Zerstören Sie die Combine-Laserkanone auf dem Schrottplatz.
description.hungarian: Semmisítsd meg a társulási robotlöveget a roncstelepen.
description.italian: Distruggi il mitragliatore automatico Combine nel deposito di rottami.
description.japanese: ジャンクヤードにあるコンバインのオートガンを破壊する。
description.norwegian: Ødelegg Combines automatvåpen hos skraphandleren.
description.polish: Zniszcz automatyczne działo Kombinatu na terenie złomowiska.
description.portuguese: Destrua o canhão automático dos Combine na sucata.
description.romanian: Distruge arma automată Combine din curtea de vechituri.
description.russian: Уничтожить автопулемет на свалке.
description.schinese: 摧毁废弃物区的联合军自动机枪。
description.spanish: Destruye el cañón de la Alianza en el desguace.
description.swedish: Förgör Combine-automatvapnet på skrotupplaget.
description.tchinese: 摧毀廢棄物區的合成人自動機槍。
description.thai: ทำลาย Combine Autogun ใน Junkyard
description.turkish: Hurdalıktaki Combine Autogun'ı yok et.

description.brazilian: Ache todos os radares no capítulo Sob o Radar.
description.english: Find every radar cache in chapter Under The Radar.
description.bulgarian: Открийте всеки пакет с радар в главата „Под радара“.
description.czech: Najdi všechny skrýše v kapitole „Pod dohledem radaru“.
description.danish: Find alle radarskjul i kapitlet Under radaren.
description.dutch: Vind alle radarcaches in het hoofdstuk Op de radar.
description.finnish: Etsi jokainen kätkö luvussa Tutkan ulkopuolella.
description.french: Trouvez toutes les caches de radar dans le chapitre L'art de la discrétion.
description.german: Finden Sie jedes Radar-Lager im Kapitel 'Unter dem Radar'.
description.hungarian: Keresd meg radarral az összes raktárt a Radarcsali c. fejezetben.
description.italian: Trova ogni scorta per il radar nel capitolo Sotto il radar.
description.japanese: チャプター内で、レーダーに反応するアイテムをすべて見つける。
description.koreana: '레이더를 피해서' 챕터에서 모든 레이더 은닉처를 찾으십시오.
description.norwegian: Finn alle radarbuffere i kapittelet Under radaren.
description.polish: Znajdź za pomocą radaru wszystkie skrytki z zapasami, ukryte w rozdziale Poza zasięgiem.
description.portuguese: Descubra todos os depósitos de radar no capítulo Debaixo do radar.
description.romanian: Găseşte fiecare ascunzătoare radar din capitolul În bătaia radarului.
description.russian: Найти все тайники в главе «Под радаром».
description.schinese: 查找“深入敌后”章节中的每个雷达隐藏处。
description.spanish: Encuentra todos los alijos detectados por radar en el capítulo Bajo el radar.
description.swedish: Hitta alla radardepåer i kapitlet Under radarn.
description.tchinese: 找出「雷達下」章節中的每個雷達快取。
description.thai: ค้นหาเรดาร์แคชทั้งหมดในบท Under The Radar
description.turkish: Radar Altında bölümündeki radarın gösterdiği tüm zulaları bul.

description.brazilian: Vença DOG numa corrida até a base da Floresta Branca.
description.english: Beat DOG in a race to the White Forest base.
description.bulgarian: Победете Кγчε в състезание до базата на Бялата гора.
description.czech: Poraz Psa v závodu do základny v Bílém lese.
description.danish: Slå DOG i et kapløb til White Forest-basen.
description.dutch: Versla DOG in een race naar de White Forest-basis.
description.finnish: Päihitä Dog juoksukisassa White Forestin tukikohtaan.
description.french: Battez Chien dans une course vers la base de White Forest.
description.german: Schlagen Sie DOG in einem Rennen zur White Forest-Basis.
description.hungarian: Győzd le Kutyát a fehér-erdei bázisig tartó versenyben.
description.italian: Sconfiggi DOG in una gara fino alla base di White Forest.
description.japanese: ホワイト・フォレスト基地までの競争で DOG に勝つ。
description.norwegian: Slå DOG i et kappløp til White Forest-basen.
description.polish: Wygraj z Dogiem wyścig do bazy White Forest.
description.portuguese: Vença DOG numa corrida até à base de White Forest.
description.romanian: Învinge-l pe DOG într-o cursă la baza Pădurii albe.
description.russian: Опередить Пса в гонке до Белой Рощи.
description.schinese: 在赛跑中跑赢狗狗率先抵达白森林基地。
description.spanish: Derrota a DOG en una carrera hasta la base de White Forest.
description.swedish: Slå DOG i loppet mot White Forest-basen.
description.tchinese: 在賽跑中跑贏狗狗率先抵達白森林基地。
description.thai: เอาชนะ DOG ในการแข่งที่ฐาน White Forest
description.turkish: White Forest üssüne olan yarışta DOG'u mağlup et.

displayName.japanese: ゴードン推進ロケット

description.brazilian: Abra o armazém de rocket launcher no capítulo Sob o Radar.
description.english: Unlock the rocket launcher lambda cache in chapter Under The Radar.
description.bulgarian: Отключете ламбда скривалището на гранатомета в главата „Под радара“.
description.czech: Najdi raketomet ve skrýši v kapitole „Pod dohledem radaru“.
description.danish: Lås op for raketstyr-lambda-skjulet i kapitlet Under radaren.
description.dutch: Ontgrendel de lambdacache van de raketlanceerder in het hoofdstuk Op de radar.
description.finnish: Avaa raketinheittimen sisältävä lambda-kätkö luvussa Tutkan ulkopuolella.
description.french: Déverrouillez la cache Lambda du lance-roquettes dans le chapitre L'art de la discrétion.
description.german: Schalten Sie im Kapitel 'Unter dem Radar' den Lambda-Behälter mit dem Raketenwerfer frei.
description.hungarian: Nyisd ki a rakétavetőt tartalmazó raktárt a Radarcsali c. fejezetben.
description.italian: Sblocca la scorta lambda del lanciarazzi nel capitolo Sotto il radar.
description.japanese: 「レーダーを頼りに」のチャプターで、ロケットランチャーを含むラムダのアイテム群を手に入れる。
description.koreana: '레이더를 피해서' 챕터에서 로켓 발사기가 있는 람다 저장소의 자물쇠를 여십시오.
description.norwegian: Lås opp lambdabufferen for rakettutskyteren i kapittelet Under radaren.
description.polish: Odblokuj skrytkę lambda z wyrzutnią rakiet, ukrytą w rozdziale Poza zasięgiem.
description.portuguese: Abra o depósito de lança-rockets lambda no capítulo Debaixo do radar.
description.romanian: Descoperă ascunzătoarea lambda a lansatorului de rachete din capitolul În bătaia radarului.
description.russian: Найти тайник с ракетами, отмеченный лямбдой.
description.schinese: 解除锁定“深入敌后”章节中的火箭发射器 λ 隐藏处。
description.spanish: Abre el alijo Lambda de cohetes en el capítulo Bajo el radar.
description.swedish: Lås upp lambda-gömman med raketgevär i kapitlet Under radarn.
description.tchinese: 解除鎖定「雷達下」章節中的火箭發射器 λ 快取。
description.thai: ปลดล็อคแลมบ์ด้าแคชเครื่องยิงจรวดในบท Under The Radar
description.turkish: Radar Altında bölümündeki roket atarı al.

description.brazilian: Sobreviva à emboscada no White Forest Inn.
description.english: Survive the ambush at White Forest Inn.
description.bulgarian: Оцелейте при засадата в странноприемницата Бялата гора.
description.czech: Přežij přepadení v hostinci v Bílém lese.
description.danish: Overlev bagholdet ved White Forest Inn.
description.dutch: Overleef de hinderlaag bij White Forest Inn.
description.french: Survivez à l'embuscade de l'auberge de White Forest.
description.german: Überleben Sie den Gasthof-Hinterhalt in White Forest.
description.hungarian: Éld túl a támadást a Fehér-erdő Fogadóban.
description.italian: Sopravvivi all'imboscata a White Forest.
description.japanese: ホワイト・フォレストの宿屋で待ち受ける戦いを生き残る。
description.norwegian: Overlev angrepet på White Forest Inn.
description.polish: Przeżyj zasadzkę w Zajeździe White Forest.
description.portuguese: Sobreviva à emboscada na White Forest Inn.
description.romanian: Supravieţuieşte ambuscadei din Hanul din Pădurea albă.
description.russian: Пережить засаду в гостинице у Белой Рощи.
description.schinese: 挫败白森林旅馆的埋伏。
description.spanish: Sobrevive a la emboscada en la posada de White Forest.
description.swedish: Överlev bakhållet på White Forest-värdshuset.
description.tchinese: 度過白森林旅館的埋伏關卡。
description.thai: รอดจากการซุ่มโจมตีที่ White Forest Inn
description.turkish: White Forest Oteli'ndeki pusudan kurtul.

description.brazilian: Envie o gnomo de jardim para o espaço.
description.english: Send the garden gnome into space.
description.bulgarian: Изпратете градинския гном в космоса.
description.czech: Pošli zahradního trpaslíka do vesmíru.
description.danish: Send havenissen ud i rummet.
description.dutch: Stuur de tuinkabouter de ruimte in.
description.french: Envoyez le nain de jardin dans l'espace.
description.german: Schicken Sie den Gartenzwerg ins Weltall.
description.hungarian: Küldd el a kertitörpét űrutazásra.
description.italian: Invia il nano da giardino nello spazio.
description.japanese: 庭の小人を宇宙まで飛ばす。
description.norwegian: Send hagenissen ut i rommet.
description.polish: Wystrzel krasnala ogrodowego na orbitę.
description.portuguese: Envie o gnomo de jardim para o espaço.
description.romanian: Trimite gnome-ul din grădină în spaţiu.
description.russian: Отправить садового гнома в космос.
description.schinese: 将花园侏儒送入太空。
description.spanish: Manda a la estratosfera al enano de jardín.
description.swedish: Skicka ut trädgårdstomten i rymden.
description.tchinese: 將花園小矮人送入太空。
description.thai: ส่งภูตโนมชาวสวนขึ้นไปบนอวกาศ
description.turkish: Bahçe cinini uzaya gönder.

displayName.japanese: 第 2 サイロ安全確保

description.brazilian: Defenda as portas de lançamento no silo de mísseis 2.
description.english: Secure the launch doors on missile silo 2.
description.bulgarian: Подсигурете вратите на противоракетния силоз 2.
description.czech: Zajisti poklop v raketovém silu 2.
description.danish: Sørg for at sikre affyringsdørene på missilsilo 2.
description.dutch: Beveilig de silodeuren van lanceersilo 2.
description.french: Sécurisez les portes de lancement sur le silo 2.
description.german: Sichern Sie die Luken von Raketensilo 2.
description.hungarian: Zárd be a 2-es rakétasiló ajtaját.
description.italian: Rendi sicuri i portelli di lancio nel silo missilistico 2.
description.japanese: 第 2 ミサイルサイロで発射扉の安全を確保する。
description.norwegian: Sikre utskytningslukene på missilrampe 2.
description.polish: Zabezpiecz drzwi wyrzutni w drugim silosie rakietowym.
description.portuguese: Proteja as portas de lançamento no silo de mísseis 2.
description.romanian: Securizează uşile de lansare ale depozitului de muniţie 2.
description.russian: Заблокировать двери второго отсека пусковой шахты.
description.schinese: 保卫第二导弹发射室的发射门。
description.spanish: Sella las puertas de lanzamiento del silo de misiles secundario.
description.swedish: Säkra uppskjutningsdörrarna på missilsilo 2.
description.tchinese: 保衛第二飛彈發射室的發射門。
description.thai: ป้องกันประตูในมิสไซล์ไซโล 2
description.turkish: 2. füze silosunun kapılarını güvence altına al.

description.brazilian: Proteja todas as construções em volta do silo de mísseis da destruição.
description.english: Save all buildings outside the missile silo from destruction.
description.bulgarian: Спасете всичките съоръжения извън противоракетния силоз от разрушение.
description.czech: Ochraň všechny budovy kolem raketového sila před zničením.
description.danish: Beskyt alle bygningerne uden for missilsiloen imod ødelæggelse.
description.dutch: Zorg ervoor dat de gebouwen buiten de lanceersilo niet vernietigd worden.
description.french: Empêchez la destruction de tous les bâtiments à l'extérieur du silo.
description.german: Retten Sie alle Gebäude außerhalb des Raketensilos vor der Zerstörung.
description.hungarian: Mentsd meg a pusztulástól rakétasiló körüli épületeket.
description.italian: Impedisci la distruzione di tutti gli edifici all'esterno del silo missilistico.
description.japanese: ミサイルサイロ外部の建物が破壊されないよう、すべて守る。
description.koreana: 미사일 사일로 밖에 있는 모든 건물이 파괴되지 않도록 하십시오.
description.norwegian: Redd alle bygningene utenfor missilrampen fra ødeleggelse.
description.polish: Ocal od zniszczenia wszystkie budynki w okolicy silosu rakietowego.
description.portuguese: Salve todos os edifícios fora do silo de mísseis de serem destruídos.
description.romanian: Salvează de la distrugere toate clădirile din afara depozitului de muniţie.
description.russian: Не дать врагу разрушить ни одно строение вокруг шахты.
description.schinese: 保护导弹发射室外的所有建筑不会被摧毁。
description.spanish: Evita que destruyan los edificios que rodean el silo de misiles.
description.swedish: Rädda alla byggnader utanför missilsilon från att förintas.
description.tchinese: 保全飛彈發射室外的所有建築不受摧毀。
description.thai: ปกป้องสิ่งก่อสร้างนอกมิสไซล์ไซโลจากการถูกทำลาย
description.turkish: Füze silosunun etrafındaki tüm binaları yıkımdan kurtar.

displayName.french: Maman, j'ai perdu le nain de jardin
displayName.thai: ภูตโนมโดดเดี่ยวผู้น่ารัก

description.english: If you are reading this achievement, Gabe Newell has successfully launched Gnome Chompski into space. If you did not also receive the achievement 'Manufacturing Ascent', Newell has abandoned his plans to shoot Noam Chomsky into space.
description.brazilian: Se você está lendo esta conquista, é porque o Gabe Newell lançou o gnomo Chompski para o espaço com sucesso. Se você não recebeu também a conquista "Manufatura da Ascensão", é porque Newell desistiu de lançar o Noam Chomsky para o espaço.
description.bulgarian: Ако четете това постижение, значи Гейб Нюъл успешно е изстрелял гнома Чомпски в Космоса. Ако при това не сте получили постижението „Произвеждане на възход“, то тогава Нюъл се е отказал от плановете си да изстреля Ноам Чомски в Космоса.
description.czech: Pokud vidíš tento achievement, Gabe Newell úspěšně vypustil trpaslíka Chompského do vesmíru. Pokud jsi neobdržel také achievement „Jak se vyrábí kosmický prach“, Newell zrušil své plány vystřelit do kosmu i Noama Chomského.
description.danish: Hvis du læser denne præstation, er det lykkedes Gabe Newell at sende Gnome Chompski ud i rummet. Hvis du ikke også har modtaget præstationen "Manufacturing Ascent", har Newell opgivet sine planer om at sende Noam Chomsky ud i rummet.
description.dutch: Als je deze prestatie te lezen krijgt dan heeft Gabe Newell kabouter Chompski met succes de ruimte in gelanceerd. Als je daarbij niet ook de prestatie 'Manufacturing Ascent' ontving, dan heeft Newell zijn plan om Noam Chomsky te ruimte in te zenden opgegeven.
description.finnish: Jos sait tämän saavutuksen, Gabe Newell on laukaissut Gnome Chompskin onnistuneesti avaruuteen. Jos taas et saanut Kuka hallitsee avaruutta -saavutusta, Newell perui suunnitelmansa laukaista Noam Chomskyn avaruuteen.
description.french: Si vous lisez la description de ce succès, cela signifie que Gabe Newell est parvenu à envoyer le nain Chompski dans l'espace. Si vous n'avez pas reçu le succès « La fabrication de l'ascension », cela signifie que Newell a abandonné l'idée d'envoyer Noam Chomsky dans l'espace.
description.german: Wenn Sie diese Errungenschaft sehen, hat Gabe Newell den Gartenzwerg Chompski erfolgreich ins All befördert. Falls Sie die Errungenschaft „Aufstieg herstellen“ nicht gleichzeitig erhalten haben, hat Newell seine Pläne, Chomsky ins All zu schießen, abgebrochen.
description.hungarian: Ha ezt a teljesítményt olvasod, Gabe Newell sikeresen kilőtte Chompski törpét az űrbe. Ha emellé nem kaptad meg a „Felszállás-gépezet” teljesítményt is, akkor Newell felhagyott a tervével, hogy Noam Chomskyt kilője az űrbe.
description.italian: Se stai leggendo questo achievement, Gabe Newell è riuscito a lanciare lo gnomo Chompski nello spazio. Se non hai ricevuto l'achievement "Un piccolo passo per un Chomsky", Newell ha rinunciato ai suoi piani di sparare Noam Chomsky nello spazio.
description.japanese: この実績を読んでいる場合、ゲイブ・ニューウェルはノーム・チョムスキー（Gnome Chompski）を宇宙に送り出すことに成功しました。実績「Manufacturing Ascent」を受け取っていない場合、ニューウェルはノーム・チョムスキー（Noam Chomsky）を宇宙に送り出す計画を破棄しています。
description.koreana: 만약 이 도전 과제를 읽고 계신다면 Gabe Newell이 성공적으로 정원 요정 노움 촘스키를 우주로 보냈다는 뜻입니다. 만약 '상승 궤도 설계' 도전 과제를 받지 못하셨다면, Newell은 노암 촘스키를 우주로 보내려는 자신의 계획을 포기했다는 뜻일 것입니다.
description.norwegian: Hvis du leser denne prestasjonen, har Gabe Newell klart å skyte Gnome Chompski ut i verdensrommet. Hvis du ikke også mottok prestasjonen «Manufacturing Ascent», har Newell gitt opp planene sine om å skyte Noam Chomsky ut i verdensrommet.
description.polish: Jeśli czytasz opis tego osiągnięcia, oznacza to, że Gabe Newell wystrzelił w kosmos Krasnala Chompski'ego. Jeśli jednocześnie nie otrzymałeś osiągnięcia „Wzrost produkcji”, oznacza to, że Gabe Newell porzucił swoje plany wystrzelenia w kosmos Noama Chomsky'ego.
description.portuguese: Se estás a ler esta proeza, Gabe Newell lançou com êxito o Gnomo Chompski para o espaço. Se também não recebeste a proeza "Ascensão Fabricada", Newel desistiu dos seus planos de disparar Noam Chomsky para o espaço.
description.romanian: Dacă citești această realizare, Gabe Newell l-a lansat cu succes pe Piticul Chompski în spațiu. Dacă însă nu ai primit și realizarea „Fabricarea ascensiunii”, Newell și-a abandonat planurile de lansare a lui Noam Chomsky în spațiu.
description.russian: Если вы читаете описание этого достижения, Гейбу Ньюэллу удалось запустить Гнома Чомски в космос. Если вы при этом не получили достижение «Производство запуска», значит, Ньюэлл отказался от планов запуска в космос Ноама Хомского.
description.schinese: 如果您正在阅读此成就，则 Gabe Newell 已成功将侏儒 Chompski 送入太空。但如果您并未同时获得“制造极致”的成就，那就意味着 Newell 已放弃了将 Noam Chomsky 送入太空的计划。
description.spanish: Si estás leyendo este logro, Gabe Newell ha lanzado con éxito al gnomo Chompski al espacio. Y si no has recibido el logro «Ascenso de fabricación», Newell ha abandonado sus planes de lanzar a Noam Chomsky al espacio.
description.swedish: Om du läser denna prestation har Gabe Newell lyckats med att skicka Gnome Chompski upp i rymden. Om du inte samtidigt fick prestationen ”Manufacturing Ascent” har Newell övergett planen på att skicka Noam Chomsky upp i rymden.
description.tchinese: 如果您正在閱讀這項成就，則 Gabe Newell 已經成功地將金色小矮人（Gnome Chompski）送上太空。但如果您並未同時獲得「製造極致」的成就，就代表 Newell 已放棄了將 Noam Chomsky 送上太空的計畫。
description.thai: ถ้าคุณกำลังอ่านเกี่ยวกับรางวัลความสำเร็จนี้อยู่ แสดงว่า Gabe Newell ได้ประสบความสำเร็จในการส่ง Gnome Chompski ไปลอยเล่นในอวกาศแล้ว แต่ถ้าคุณไม่ได้รับรางวัลความสำเร็จ 'Manufacturing Ascent' นี้ด้วยเช่นกัน ก็หมายความว่า Gabe ได้ล้มเลิกแผนของเขาในการส่ง Noam Chomsky ไปสู่ห้วงอวกาศ
description.turkish: Bu başarımı okuyorsanız, Gabe Newell, Gnome Chompski'yi başarıyla uzaya göndermiş demektir. İmalatın Yükselişi başarımını almadıysanız, Newell, Noam Chomsky'yi uzaya gönderme planından vazgeçmiş demektir.
